text: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَقَدۡ خَلَتۡ سُنَّةُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

translation.en: They will not believe in it, while there has already occurred the precedent of the former peoples
translation.id: mereka tidak beriman kepadanya (Alquran) padahal telah berlalu sunnatullah433) terhadap orang-orang terdahulu
